mapper.insert: insert into error_code_lib (id, album, code, error_code, type, deltag, analysis, plan) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{album,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deltag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analysis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{plan,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update error_code_lib set album = #{album,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_code = #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deltag = #{deltag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, analysis = #{analysis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, plan = #{plan,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, album, code, error_code, type, deltag, analysis, plan from error_code_lib
